headline: Higher Earnings and Aggressive Buybacks Could Be A Game Changer For Las Vegas Sands (LVS)
summary: Las Vegas Sands Corp. recently reported its full-year 2025 results, with sales of US$12,373 million, revenue of US$13,017 million, and net income of US$1,627 million, alongside higher earnings per share from continuing operations versus the prior year. At the same time, the company continued returning capital to shareholders through an US$0.30 quarterly dividend and a long-running buyback program that has retired about 17.63% of its shares since 2016. With this combination of higher earnings...
